channel.title: PvPRealm || 24/7 || Awesome Features || 317 ||
channel.description:
Hello Guys, Been trying to post this advertisement thread for like so long but didn't had time to. I'm finally going to post this thread as i'm just that awesome. [img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/3493/b4a6ce889c9d42ab91f86f7.png[/img] What is PvPRealm is actually about?
It's about a guy named Tim, He was outside playing with his friends when he knew he was born to be something. He went inside and switched on his laptop and searched "How to be cool like chuck norris" on Google. The first result was RSPS! From then on, he went to JAVA programming Classes from Kindergarden all the way up to University and received a degree in "Nerd Java Programming". He later moved on creating games for himself such as solitare and pinball. After he grew bored, He moved on to Runescape. He found out that Evolution of combat was gay and how people was quitting and he felt that he should be doing better then this to serve the community of the internet better. So he downloaded a source from Rune-Server and changed the server names and usernames. When he released it to public and let players play it, he realise he had little players. So he went on and code it and made it as enjoyable as possible. It was named Platinum-X back then and it has grew bigger and better. It had a overwhelming response when PvPRealm was first released to the public and we would like to thank you to the players who showed their support. We have been growing daily and receiving support from players. The Main Owner also thought that why he didn't do this in the first place when RSW was in its early years growing rapidly with 4 pools in the chatbox. Now, PvPRealm has been decently known around the RSW Community and soon to the RSPS Community out there. I'm glad to say PvPRealm has overcome many challenges and problems together as a one big family.
[b]╚Features╝[/b] Event Bot [b]Player Skilling Achievement System with Rewards PkP Chest Killstreaks Loyalty Titles Crystal Key Chest The almighty Penguins that drops great items ::wheel NPC Killing system Dominion Tower VPS Hosted 24/7 Forums and Domain Black Partyhat Steadfast Boots Glaiven Boots Tokhaar-Kal Most of the skills work Most Dupes Fixed Most Deadlocks fixed. Stable server Lots of glitches and bugs fixed Good XP Rates Good Drop Rates Skeletal Wyverns [/b]
[b]And finally some MEDIA![/b] [b]PENGUINS![/b] [img]http://img818.imageshack.us/img818/8895/003b961f8df145639b2f8b9.png[/img] [b]Skeletal Wyverns![/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/3Gs0W.png[/img] [b]Killstreak System[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/1Ul8d.png[/img] [b]NPC Killing system[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/WpDUS.png[/img] [b]Dominion Tower Shop[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/wwROh.png[/img] [b]Dominion Tower MiniGame[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ig2Wx.png[/img] [b]PkP Shop[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/i1AdV.png[/img] [b]Vote Point Shop[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/PutwM.png[/img] [b]Donator Island[/b] [img]http://img839.imageshack.us/img839/9674/df4301d9b66943a3b931bc3.png[/img] [b]Donator Point Store[/b] [img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1305/2bfb548fc45248bb8ffeec2.png[/img] [b]PkP Chest[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/YSOz2.png[/img] [b]Event Bot[/b] [img]http://img28.imageshack.us/img28/5798/245d0eacc922418bb050a4c.png[/img]
Finally I would like to say thank you for taking your time to read this advertisement thread and hope to see you in-game.
[b][url=http://pvp-realm.com]PvPRealm Forums[/url][/b] [b][url=http://pvp-realm.com/webclient.html]PvPRealm Webclient[/url][/b] [b][url=http://pvp-realm.com/client.jar]PvPRealm Desktop Client[/url][/b]

item.title: PvPRealm || 24/7 || Awesome Features || 317 ||
item.dc:creator: @newas9 newas9
item.description:
@newas9 wrote:

Hello Guys, Been trying to post this advertisement thread for like so long but didn’t had time to. I’m finally going to post this thread as i’m just that awesome.

What is PvPRealm is actually about?

It’s about a guy named Tim, He was outside playing with his friends when he knew he was born to be something. He went inside and switched on his laptop and searched “How to be cool like chuck norris” on Google. The first result was RSPS!
From then on, he went to JAVA programming Classes from Kindergarden all the way up to University and received a degree in “Nerd Java Programming”. He later moved on creating games for himself such as solitare and pinball. After he grew bored, He moved on to Runescape. He found out that Evolution of combat was gay and how people was quitting and he felt that he should be doing better then this to serve the community of the internet better. So he downloaded a source from Rune-Server and changed the server names and usernames. When he released it to public and let players play it, he realise he had little players. So he went on and code it and made it as enjoyable as possible. It was named Platinum-X back then and it has grew bigger and better. It had a overwhelming response when PvPRealm was first released to the public and we would like to thank you to the players who showed their support. We have been growing daily and receiving support from players. The Main Owner also thought that why he didn’t do this in the first place when RSW was in its early years growing rapidly with 4 pools in the chatbox. Now, PvPRealm has been decently known around the RSW Community and soon to the RSPS Community out there. I’m glad to say PvPRealm has overcome many challenges and problems together as a one big family.

╚Features╝
Event Bot
Player Skilling Achievement System with Rewards
PkP Chest
Killstreaks
Loyalty Titles
Crystal Key Chest
The almighty Penguins that drops great items
::wheel
NPC Killing system
Dominion Tower
VPS Hosted 24/7
Forums and Domain
Black Partyhat
Steadfast Boots
Glaiven Boots
Tokhaar-Kal
Most of the skills work
Most Dupes Fixed
Most Deadlocks fixed.
Stable server
Lots of glitches and bugs fixed
Good XP Rates
Good Drop Rates
Skeletal Wyverns

And finally some MEDIA!
PENGUINS!

Skeletal Wyverns!

Killstreak System

NPC Killing system

Dominion Tower Shop

Dominion Tower MiniGame

PkP Shop

Vote Point Shop

Donator Island

Donator Point Store

PkP Chest

Event Bot

Finally I would like to say thank you for taking your time to read this advertisement thread and hope to see you in-game.
